title: PM condoles loss of lives in traffic accident
content:
DOHA, Mar 5 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Sunday expressed grief and sorrow over the traffic accident near Dara Zinda in Dera Ismail Khan.The prime minister condoled with the bereaved families and prayed to Allah Almighty to elevate the ranks of the deceased in paradise.He also prayed for the early recovery of the injured.He directed the provision of all possible medical assistance to the injured.
